verses.verse: לַ֝מְנַצֵּ֗חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-ach, o the chief Musician לְדָוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> [Tle-da-Vid[A Psalm] of David לְהַזְכִּֽיר׃ <S%H2142><s%> le-haz-Kir. to bring to remembrance אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him [Make haste] O God לְהַצִּילֵ֑נִי <S%H5337><s%> le-hatz-tzi-Le-ni; to deliver יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh me O LORD לְעֶזְרָ֥תִי <S%H5833><s%> le-'ez-Ra-ti to help חֽוּשָֽׁה׃ <S%H2363><s%> Chu-Shah. me make haste

יֵבֹ֣שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> ye-Vo-shu Let them be ashamed וְיַחְפְּרוּ֮ <S%H2659><s%> ve-yach-pe-Ru and confounded מְבַקְשֵׁ֪י <S%H1245><s%> me-vak-Shei that seek נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi after my soul יִסֹּ֣גוּ <S%H5472><s%> yis-So-gu let them be turned אָ֭חוֹר <S%H268><s%> 'A-chor backward וְיִכָּלְמ֑וּ <S%H3637><s%> ve-yik-kal-Mu; and put to confusion חֲ֝פֵצֵ֗י <S%H2655><s%> cha-fe-Tzei, that desire רָעָתִֽי׃ <S%H7451><s%> ra-'a-Ti. my hurt

יָ֭שׁוּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> Ya-shu-vu Let them be turned back עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- for עֵ֣קֶב <S%H6118><s%> 'E-kev for a reward בָּשְׁתָּ֑ם <S%H1322><s%> ba-she-Tam; of their shame הָ֝אֹמְרִ֗ים <S%H559><s%> ha-'o-me-Rim, that say הֶ֘אָ֥ח׀ <S%H1889><s%> he-'Ach Aha הֶאָֽח׃ <S%H1889><s%> he-'Ach. aha

יָ֘שִׂ֤ישׂוּ <S%H7797><s%> ya-Si-su thee rejoice וְיִשְׂמְח֨וּ׀ <S%H8055><s%> ve-yis-me-Chu and be glad בְּךָ֗ be-Cha, כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> kal- all מְבַ֫קְשֶׁ֥יךָ <S%H1245><s%> me-Vak-Shei-cha Let all those that seek וְיֹאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> ve-yo-me-Ru say תָ֭מִיד <S%H8548><s%> Ta-mid continually יִגְדַּ֣ל <S%H1431><s%> yig-Dal be magnified אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; Let God אֹ֝הֲבֵ֗י <S%H157><s%> 'o-ha-Vei, in thee and let such as love יְשׁוּעָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3444><s%> ye-shu-'a-Te-cha. thy salvation

וַאֲנִ֤י׀ <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I עָנִ֣י <S%H6041><s%> 'a-Ni But I [am] poor וְאֶבְיוֹן֮ <S%H34><s%> ve-'ev-yOn and needy אֱלֹהִ֪ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him unto me O God חֽוּשָׁ֫ה־ <S%H2363><s%> chu-Shah- make haste לִּ֥י li עֶזְרִ֣י <S%H5828><s%> 'ez-Ri thou [art] my help וּמְפַלְטִ֣י <S%H6403><s%> u-me-fal-Ti and my deliverer אַ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> 'At-tah; O יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תְּאַחַֽר׃ <S%H309><s%> te-'a-Char. make no tarrying
